tofu.title: House Foods Tofu Recall
tofu.description: House Foods America Corporation recalls certain tofu products due to potential contamination with Listeria monocytogenes.
tofu.recommendation: Check UPC codes. Do not consume if UPC matches recalled products.

seaweed.title: Heavy Metals in Seaweed
seaweed.description: Some seaweed products may contain elevated levels of arsenic or iodine. Choose products tested for heavy metals.
seaweed.recommendation: Look for brands that test for heavy metals. Limit intake to recommended serving sizes.

produce_greens.title: Dole Salad Recall - E. coli
produce_greens.description: Dole Fresh Vegetables recalls bagged salads due to possible E. coli O157:H7 contamination.
produce_greens.recommendation: Check use-by dates Dec 22-Jan 9. Discard if matching.

eggs.title: Milo's Poultry Farms Egg Recall - Salmonella
eggs.description: Milo's Poultry Farms recalls shell eggs due to potential Salmonella Enteritidis contamination.
eggs.recommendation: Check carton for Milo's Poultry Farms. Return for refund if matching.

fruit_berries.title: Winter Berry Season
fruit_berries.description: Fresh berries in winter are imported from Mexico, Chile, or greenhouse-grown. May have longer transport time.
fruit_berries.recommendation: Consider frozen berries for better nutrition retention and lower cost in winter.

miso_paste.title: Sodium Content Notice
miso_paste.description: Miso paste is high in sodium (600-900mg per tablespoon). Use sparingly if on sodium-restricted diet.
miso_paste.recommendation: Start with 1 tbsp per serving. Low-sodium miso varieties are available.
